entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Victoria Beach
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
